#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Bring In and Keep Customers
#Text=The first step to any successful business is promotion and marketing , and the second follow-up step is retention .
#Text=To learn how to bring in and keep customers can be challenging if you have never been exposed to marketing or public relations .
#Text=By following a few easy steps , however , you should be able to not only boost business but keep it steady and/or growing as well .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Start with noticeable and recognizable signage .
#Text=You want your drive-by traffic to know who you are and what your business does .
#Text=Make any day an excuse for an event .
#Text=Be it a sale , an anniversary , or an open house , celebrate by promoting an event and opening your doors to the general public .
#Text=Offer an incentive to visit or refer your business .
#Text=Run a time-sensitive sale or special to drive in traffic .
#Text=Offer a referral incentive for those who refer new customers your way .
#Text=Consider print advertising such as the newspaper , magazine , or ads or listings in the phone book .
#Text=Devote time and energy in a website and in maintaining a social networking page for your business .
#Text=Both of these tools can be low cost and offer you means to keep your name in front of the crowd electronically .
#Text=Think about radio or television ads .
#Text=Radio works wonderfully for event-driven exposure , and television can help you build brand recognition .
#Text=Network with local professional organizations to build a referral system for year-round leads .
#Text=Work to keep the customer base that you have built .
#Text=Start with quality customer service .
#Text=Be polite and respectful to everyone who comes in your door , and treat that person as you would want to be treated .
#Text=Train your staff not only how to be polite but how to successfully do their jobs as well .
#Text=Being nice does n't sell your product , nor does it help your staff avoid mistakes .
#Text=Instead , that comes with good training and practice .
#Text=With their permission , sign your customers up for your mailing or email list .
#Text=You can do this in the store or on your website .
#Text=Institute a best practices methodology that includes not selling or sharing the customers ' information with anyone outside of your business .
#Text=Make sure that this policy is shared on your website for full transparency .
#Text=Follow up with emails to join your Facebook page , send a copy of an online newsletter or send emails about upcoming sales or special events .
#Text=You want to keep your clients engaged in what is going on at your business , but on the other side be sure not to inundate them .
#Text=Mail out fliers , hard copy coupons or newsletters if the printing and mailing costs are affordable for you .
#Text=Always include an opt-out option so that customers do n't feel like they are stuck getting your correspondence if they do n't really want to .
#Text=Tips
#Text=Try to boost your search engine status by embedding pertinent tags into your web pages .
#Text=You should also link your home page to the majority of the pages on your site .
